mapper.select: SELECT eq_log_data FROM ( SELECT eq_log_id ,eq_name ,eq_log_data ,eq_log_date FROM test_eq_log WHERE eq_name = #{eqName} ORDER BY eq_log_date DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
SELECT to_char(eq_log_date,'MM-dd HH:mm:ss') FROM ( SELECT eq_log_id ,eq_name ,eq_log_data ,eq_log_date FROM test_eq_log ORDER BY eq_log_date DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
